Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <GEBucky> When is the new algo being implemented? I had heard Sunday but curious if that is still on track. Thanks

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <miketout> we are planning to fork on block 310000, which is Dec 28th. releases are being prepared today.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <miketout> new algo has been implemented for a little while now. we have been tracking down and then working around a thread local storage bug in MingW/gcc compiler for the windows build. the first release includes portable support as well, since that was done as we were looking for the windows issue.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <VirtualSoundNW> Always best to fork on a fixed block height for this sort of thing so everybody has a weeklong window to get upgraded.
